exact_source: TRM has agreed to fund A$86,000 of initial works at the Dudley Lithium Project up to 12 December 2024. Stage 1a Minimum expenditures A$350,000 (in aggregate by around January 2026). Stage 1b Minimum expenditures A$700,000 (in aggregate by around January 2027). Stage 2 Minimum expenditures A$1.4M (in aggregate, including Stage 1, by around February 2029). (Total potential exploration spend by TRM for Dudley Project is A$1.4M * 0.70 USD/AUD = USD 980,000). No specific exploration commitment for EYL Project acquisition.
